name: animalcognition
0:
”Alexa open animal cognition”
”Alexa ask animal cognition for a fact”
”Alexa tell animal cognition to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal cognition
des:
Ask for Animal Cognition and learn about the unknown facts about animals.

Animal Cognition provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Animal Cognition" or "Alexa, open Animal Cognition" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
